mapper.insert: insert into BR_BROKER (BROKERID, PASSWORD, NAME, TELEPHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, FIRMID, AREAID, MEMBERTYPE, TIMELIMIT, MARKETMANAGER, MODIFYTIME, NOTE) values (#{brokerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{membertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timelimit,jdbcType=DATE}, #{marketmanager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{note,jdbcType=CLOB})
